Episodes.Title: Dexter
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter's world is rocked when a rival serial murderer, dubbed the Ice Truck Killer by the media, privately contacts him and reveals that he knows Dexter's grisly secret. Meanwhile, Dexter's sister Debra is transferred to Homicide.

Episodes.Title: Crocodile
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Clyde Phillips
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter's world is rocked when a rival serial murderer, dubbed the Ice Truck Killer by the media, privately contacts him and reveals that he knows Dexter's grisly secret. Meanwhile, Dexter's sister Debra is transferred to Homicide.

Episodes.Title: Popping Cherry
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Daniel Cerone
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter and Debra try to dissuade their boss from pursuing a security guard they believe has been wrongly identified as the Ice Truck Killer. Dexter's girlfriend receives an unwelcome visit from an associate of her imprisoned husband.

Episodes.Title: Let's Give the Boy a Hand
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Drew Z. Greenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The Ice Truck Killer begins leaving body parts from his victims at sites that relate to memories from Dexter's childhood, forcing him to confront his dark personal history.

Episodes.Title: Love American Style
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Melissa Rosenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The Homicide Division is buzzing after the Ice Truck Killer's latest victim is found mutilated but alive, while Dexter gets in over his head when he stalks a murderous human trafficker.

Episodes.Title: Return to Sender
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Tim Schlattmann
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The Ice Truck Killer leaves Dexter a surprise at the scene of one of Dexter's recent kills, placing him firmly in the cross hairs of his own Homicide Division colleagues.

Episodes.Title: Circle of Friends
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Daniel Cerone
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The Ice Truck Killer is finally identified, but something about the suspect doesn't sit right with Dexter, who must also deal with the menacing return of Rita's paroled ex-husband.

Episodes.Title: Shrink Wrap
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Lauren Gussis
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The strange suicide of a powerful woman leads Dexter to suspect her shrink of murder, but he gets a shock when a visit to the suspect opens up dark secrets from Dexter's past.

Episodes.Title: Father Knows Best
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Melissa Rosenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter is joined by Rita, Debra and Rudy for a weekend away when he learns that his biological father, whom he was told died thirty years ago, has just recently passed away and left him everything he owned, including his house.

Episodes.Title: Seeing Red
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Kevin Maynard
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The Ice Truck Killer leaves Dexter the most horrifying crime scene imaginable, forcing him to confront a horrific suppressed memory from his past; Rita must hire a lawyer when her ex sues for sole custody of their children.

Episodes.Title: Truth Be Told
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Drew Z. Greenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: The Ice Truck Killer kidnaps someone close to Dexter, forcing him into a trap that will forever change his life, while Doakes begins to harbor suspicions about Dexter's odd behavior.

Episodes.Title: Born Free
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Daniel Cerone
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: In the Season One finale, Dexter follows the clues left for him by the Ice Truck Killer in an effort to rescue his kidnapped loved one, while Rita's ex tries to convince her that Dexter is too dangerous to be around their children.
